96typedef enum
97{
98 AM_HAL_UART_DMA_NONE,
99 AM_HAL_UART_DMA_TX_DOUBLE_BUFFER,
100 AM_HAL_UART_DMA_TX_SINGLE_BUFFER,
101 AM_HAL_UART_DMA_RX_SINGLE,
102 AM_HAL_UART_DMA_RX_DOUBLE,
103 //AM_HAL_UART_DMA_RX_TX_SINGLE, //!< This is not supported
104 //AM_HAL_UART_DMA_RX_TX_DOUBLE, //!< This is not supported
105 AM_HAL_UART_DMA_MODE_ENTRIES,
106}
107am_hal_uart_streaming_dma_mode_e;

109#define AM_HAL_DMA_TX_QUEUE_MAX_ENTRIES 3
110#define AM_HAL_DMA_RX_QUEUE_MAX_ENTRIES 2

112//*****************************************************************************
113//
116//
117//*****************************************************************************
118typedef enum
119{
120 AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_SUCCESS = 0,
121 AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_RX_QUEUE_FULL = 0x0001,
122 AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_RX_DATA_AVAIL = 0x0002,
123 AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_TX_QUEUE_FULL = 0x0004,
124 AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_TX_COMPLETE = 0x0008,
125 AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_TX_BUSY = 0x0010,
126 AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_TX_DMA_BUSY = 0x0020,
127 AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_TX_DMA_COMPLETE = 0x0020,
128 AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_DMA_ERROR = 0x0040,
129 AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_INTERNAL_DMA_ERROR = 0x0080,
130 AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_FRM_ERROR = UART0_DR_FEDATA_Msk, // 0x0100 <-> 0x0800 are reserved for hardware outputs
131 AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_PRTY_ERROR = UART0_DR_PEDATA_Msk,
132 AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_BRK_ERROR = UART0_DR_BEDATA_Msk,
133 AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_OVRN_ERROR = UART0_DR_OEDATA_Msk,
134 AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_INTRNL_MSK = (AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_FRM_ERROR
135 | AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_OVRN_ERROR
136 | AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_PRTY_ERROR
137 | AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_BRK_ERROR),
138 AM_HAL_UART_RX_DMA_ERROR = 0x01000,
139 AM_HAL_UART_RX_DMA_COMPLETE = 0x02000,
140 AM_HAL_UART_RX_DMA_BUSY = 0x04000,
141 AM_HAL_UART_RX_DMA_TIMEOUT = 0x08000,
142 AM_HAL_UART_RX_DMA_OVERFLOW = 0x10000,
143 AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_DMA_CFG_ERROR = 0x20000,
144 AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_BUSY_WAIT_CMPL = 0x40000,
145 AM_HAL_UART_INVALID_HANDLE = 0x80000,
146 AM_HAL_UART_STREAM_STATUS_x32 = 0x7F000000, // force all compilers to use 32bit
147}
148am_hal_uart_stream_status_t;

156typedef struct uart_dma_tx_qe
157{
158 struct uart_dma_tx_qe *nextDesc;
159 uint32_t ui32BuffBaseAddr;
160 uint32_t ui32StartAddress;
161 uint32_t ui32BufferSize;
162 uint32_t ui32NumBytes;
163 uint32_t ui32NumDmaQueued;
164 uint8_t descIdx;
165 uint8_t align[3];
166}
167am_hal_uart_stream_dma_tx_descriptor_entry_t;

171//
172typedef enum
173{
174 eAM_HAL_TX_COMPL_NO_NOTIFICATION = 0,
175 eAM_HAL_TX_COMPL_DMA_COMPLETE = 0x01,
176 eAM_HAL_TX_COMPL_TX_COMPLETE = 0x02,
177 eAM_HAL_TX_COMPL_BUSY_WAIT_COMPLETE = 0x04,
178 eAM_HAL_TX_COMPL_x32 = 0x80000000,
179
180} am_hal_uart_stream_tx_complete_options_t;
